text: Flock is a web browser based on Mozilla Firefox. Flock is also the name of the company making the browser. ==Awards== Upon leaving beta, Flock has won a number of awards: *Webby Award in social networking, 2008 *SXSW community Award, 2008 *Open Web Award for Applications and Widgets, 2007 | publisher = PC World | accessdate = 2008-06-17 | archive-date = 2008-06-11 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20080611111731/http://www.pcworld.com/article/id,146161-page,12-c,electronics/article.html ==References== ==Other websites== * * Flock developer portal Category:Web browsers Category:Web browsers based on Firefox Category:Mozilla
title: Flock (web browser)
